Name: VR Roller Coaster - Cave Depths
About the game: Experience the crazy Roller Coaster ride in Cave Depths. This 3D roller coaster will blow your mind with an exciting environment with more than 2 min ride. We have an interactive part in the experience, where you are choosing the direction where to go with head movement. Get ready for limitless Virtual Reality, powered by ARLOOPA. Features: -Amazing environment with realistic sounds and nature. -Exciting VR Roller Coaster experience in the mountain depths. -Get through the fairy caves. -Feel the sense of adrenaline. Wishing you a pleasant ride. ARLOOPA Inc.
